speaker: Narration
text: You descend into the Womb-Below. The air thickens, pulsating with the heartbeat of ancient power. Shadows twist into living shapes around you.

speaker: Godling
text: Your bond with me will decide the course of divinity. Choose wisely, for the path you take shapes both your power and your soul.

choices.text: Low Bond Path: Kill the godling.

speaker: Narration
text: The chamber glows with divine energy. Tendrils of light and shadow reach for you, testing your will. Your choices here will echo through eternity.

choices.text: Fully submit and accept the godling's essence.
Attempt a balanced merge, retaining your identity.
Hesitate and observe the chamber's energies first.

speaker: Narration
text: The chamber pulses violently. A surge of divine energy lashes out, threatening your body and mind. You must react quickly.

choices.text: Resist and try to stabilize yourself.

speaker: Godling
text: The essence flows into you, reshaping flesh, mind, and spirit. Your power is unparalleled, but at what cost?

choices.text: Submissive surrender, let the godling dominate.

speaker: Narration
text: Rejecting the godlingâ€™s influence, you enter the final trial alone. The Womb-Below seethes with predators and lost souls, testing your strength, morality, and cunning.

speaker: Narration
text: Predators descend from every shadow. Will you protect the weak, or sacrifice others to survive? Every choice leaves a mark on your destiny.

choices.text: Protect the weak, even at your own peril.
Sacrifice others to survive, gaining ruthless power.
Manipulate the predators against each other.

speaker: Narration
text: The heart of the Womb-Below opens. A massive void hums with the potential to end or transcend life itself. Your previous choices converge here.

choices.text: Claim ultimate power and reshape the world.
Merge cunningly with lingering god essence.
